! Title: Filters for Instagram Distractions
! Description: The uBlock Origin filter list that hides all distractions on Instagram to make usage less addictive and more focused.
! Homepage: https://github.com/BevizLaszlo/UBlock-Filters-for-Social-Media
! License: MIT

! Removes "Suggested for you", "Because you watched [...]" and similar in feed
www.instagram.com##+js(json-prune, require.0.3.0.__bbox.require.0.3.1.__bbox.result.data.xdt_api__v1__feed__timeline__connection.edges.[-].node.explore_story.media.explore.title data.xdt_api__v1__feed__timeline__connection.edges.[-].node.explore_story.media.explore.title)
! Removes "Threads" in feed
www.instagram.com##+js(json-prune, require.0.3.0.__bbox.require.0.3.1.__bbox.result.data.xdt_api__v1__feed__timeline__connection.edges.[-].node.bloks_netego.payload)
www.instagram.com##+js(json-prune-xhr-response, data.xdt_api__v1__feed__timeline__connection.edges.[-].node.bloks_netego.payload, , propsToMatch, url:/api/graphql)
! Hides "Threads" hyper-references
www.instagram.com##a[href="https://www.threads.net/"]
